name: df-esum
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
comment: Define a short-hand for the possibly infinite sum over the extended nonnegative reals. ` sum* ` is relying on the properties of the ` tsums ` , developped by Mario Carneiro. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2016.)
